articles.title: 4th National Presentation and Workshop in Field of Mushroom Production Held
articles.content:
4th National Presentation and Workshop in Field of Mushroom Production Held
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The fourth national presentation of technology and experience and workshop in cultivation of mushroom took place at the Sci-Tech Complex Oct. 23-25 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers, field officials and cultivators of mushroom from more than 30 units, including Kim Il Sung University, the State Academy of Sciences, the Central Mushroom Research Institute of the Ministry of Agriculture, Ryugyong Mushroom Farm and Changsong Mushroom Farm.
					
					 The participants heard achievements and experience gained in the work to actively introduce advanced and practical cultivation methods, raise species of mushroom, cut down as much as possible production cost and energy and increase output. 
					
					 Papers of theoretical and practical significance in putting mushroom production on a scientific, intensive, industrial and popular basis were highly appreciated.
					
					 There took place a workshop on the technology of managing various species of mushroom, technology of production of Auricularia auricular No. 1 and designing of annual mushroom production by use of wastes in the semi-vaulted greenhouse of Pyongyang Mushroom Farm.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Help Korean Peasants
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Help Korean Peasants
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy here helped peasants in rice-threshing at the Korea-Russia Friendship Kochang Vegetable Co-op Farm in Chollima District of Nampho City on Wednesday.
					 They handed over aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Experience-sharing Meeting of Trade Union Held
articles.content:
Experience-sharing Meeting of Trade Union Held
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A meeting for sharing experience on the trade union work took place at the Central Hall of Workers on Wednesday to mark the first anniversary of the publication of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Duty of the Working Class of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the Times and the Tasks Facing Trade Union Organizations". 
					 Present there were Chairman Ju Yong Gil and other officials of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and officials of primary trade union organizations.
					
					 The participants heard achievements and experience gained by the officials of the GFTUK and primary organizations in the work for building up trade union organizations into the militant ranks strong in organizational power and solidarity to carry out the tasks set forth by the Supreme Leader in his work.
					
					 Speakers expressed their resolve to work hard to arouse all the trade union members to the struggle for carrying the tasks set forth at the Second Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, true to the idea and guidance of the Supreme Leader.

articles.title: Rice Harvesting Finished in Co-op Farm Fields of DPRK
articles.content:
Rice Harvesting Finished in Co-op Farm Fields of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Rice harvest has been finished across the country thanks to the efforts made by officials and working people in the agricultural field in the DPRK.
					 Rice harvest has been finished on farms in South and North Phyongan Provinces by Oct. 16 despite unfavorable weather conditions.
					
					 The agricultural workers in Phyongsong City, Jungsan, Taedong, Mundok, Ryongchon, Kwaksan, Yomju and Phihyon Counties finished harvesting before others and have directed efforts into transferring rice-sheaves and rice threshing.
					
					 Those in South Hwanghae Province carried out rice harvesting in more than 5,000 hectares of field every day.
					
					 The officials and agricultural workers in the northern areas including South and North Hamgyong provinces are pushing forward threshing with the same spirit with which they finished the rice harvesting.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Soccer Team Secures Berths in Finals of 2017 AFC U-19 Women's Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Soccer Team Secures Berths in Finals of 2017 AFC U-19 Women's Championship
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's football team secured berths in the finals of the 2017 AFC U-19 Women's Championship.
					 In the semifinals on Oct. 25 the DPRK team beat its Australian rival 3-0 and thus was qualified for the 2018 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup due in France. 
					
					 It is to play the finals with its Japanese rival on Oct. 28.

articles.title: Results of 2017 Inter-Provincial Mass Sports Contest in DPRK
articles.content:
Results of 2017 Inter-Provincial Mass Sports Contest in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The 2017 Inter-provincial Mass Sports Contest is going on in Pyongyang amid the interest of sports fans and working people.
					 As of October 24, the Pyongyang City Team took the first place at men's boxing and radio-controlled aero model in the professional sports field and tennis in the mass sports field.
					
					 The South Phyongan Provincial Team finished first in Taekwon-Do in the mass sports field.
					
					 Women's football and men's basketball in the professional sports field and women's volleyball in the mass sports field reached the final stage.
					
					 The Pyongyang City Team beat the South Hamgyong Provincial Team 5:0, and the South Phyongan Provincial Team defeated the North Hwanghae Provincial Team 4:0 in semifinals of women's football event held on October 23.
					
					 The Pyongyang City Team will compete with the South Phyongan Provincial Team in the finals on Thursday.
					
					 The teams from Pyongyang City, South and North Hamgyong provinces and Nampho City advanced to semifinals of men's basketball event and the Pyongyang City Team and the South Phyongan Provincial Team the finals of women's volleyball event.
					
					 The contest will last until Friday.

articles.title: Static Condensers Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
Static Condensers Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Electric Appliances Plant plays an important role in modernizing power supply system of the country.
					 Now, the plant is producing varied static condensers helping reduce electricity loss in transmission.
					
					 Recently, more than 40 kinds of static condensers have won a state quality certification.
					
					 Those products are 1.5 times longer than the previous ones in serviceable life and firmly ensure the technological specification indexes.
					
					 They are to be installed at transformers and motors with different capacity and induction furnaces.
					
					 The plant has also introduced a pneumatic test jig into production to fully ensure technical requirement of products.
					
					 Chief Engineer Pak Myong Chol said that the plant is producing static condensers for ultrahigh-voltage power system.

articles.title: Taesongsan Sports Team
articles.content:
Taesongsan Sports Team
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Taesongsan Sports Team has directed big efforts to putting the sports on a scientific basis.
					 It has developed or updated various programs and apparatuses helpful towards the improvement of coaches' qualifications and players' physical and technical abilities.
					
					 In particular, the multi-purpose physical training apparatus is used by several players simultaneously, winning popularity among coaches and players.

articles.title: Anju Pump Factory
articles.content:
Anju Pump Factory
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Anju Pump Factory of the DPRK has produced various kinds of pumps this year and sent them to different sectors of national economy.
					 Among them are pump for underground ultra-saline water, feed-water pump and cooling-and-heating circulation pump.
					
					 The new pump for underground ultra-saline water raised suction capacity and efficiency by 12 percent as compared with the previous one. 
					
					 The feed-water pump, a horizontal multistage centrifugal pump, is low in production cost and has good technical characteristics, enjoying popularity among the users.
					
					 The cooling-and-heating circulation pump, a horizontal single-stage centrifugal pump, is used for supply of domestic water and circulation of cooling-and-heating system.
					
					Now, one hundred and tens of cooling-and-heating circulation pumps are operating on a normal basis in Ryomyong Street.

articles.title: UN Reform Is Essential Requirement: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
UN Reform Is Essential Requirement: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday dedicates an article to the UN Day.
					 The international situation today goes quite contrary to the purport of the UN, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 It is important for the UN Security Council to ensure impartiality in its activities in order to fulfill its responsibility for international peace and security. But the principle of respect for sovereignty, equality and non-interference in the internal affairs is openly ignored in the UNSC and illegitimate "resolutions" justifying the U.S. domination policy are railroaded.
					
					 The UNSC is following the U.S. logic and sophism that points should be made on depending on who does it, not what is being discussed, and legality and illegality should be made depending on the differences in social systems.
					
					 It is essential to reform the UN at an early date in order to establish a new and fair international order after clearing the planet of the looming danger of a war.
					
					 It is quite natural for the UN General Assembly to look after the UN activities as a whole and it should be invested with the power to finally examine the resolutions of the UNSC on sanctions and use of force, in particular, which have serious impacts on peace and security.
					
					 The reform of the UNSC, a key point of UN reform, is an urgent matter.
					
					The reform of the UNSC should be carried out on the principle of fully guaranteeing the impartiality and objectivity of activities and fully providing the representation of developing countries.
					
					 As a full-fledged UN member nation the DPRK will as ever make sincere efforts to ensure world peace and security and develop friendly relations with all the countries respecting its sovereignty.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Unification Minister's Paradox
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Unification Minister's Paradox
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet minister of Unification claimed in his recent report at the "parliamentary inspection of the administration" that his ministry would "press ahead with the fundamental and peaceful tackling of the nuclear issue" as a "major party" to the issue of the Korean peninsula. Talking about "initiative to spell out proposal for peace" and "creation of environment for dialogue on denuclearization," he impudently called for "inducing the north to sit on the negotiating table for dismantling its nukes" by slapping "tough sanctions and pressure" on it with the backing of the international community.
					 Terming the speech imprudent remarks, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article:
					
					 It seems that the south Korean puppet authorities are unaware of where they are standing.
					
					 The puppet regime has neither qualifications nor capacity to talk about "party to the issue of the Korean peninsula."
					
					 No matter what those of the Unification Ministry may spout to facelift their poor image and create an impression that it would do something significant, it will get them nowhere.
					
					 They are keeping mum about their American master's hysteric behavior of categorically denying the sovereignty and rights to existence and development of the fellow countrymen in the north. Only to make matters worse, they support it, faulting the nuclear deterrent of the DPRK, the treasured sword for preserving the security of the nation and peace, and getting desperate to eliminate it.
					
					 This is just an act of treachery of those who lost their sense of national independence, bereft of reason.
					
					 Their attempt to realize the "dialogue for denuclearization" through tougher "sanctions and pressure" is just a wild dream.

articles.title: Trump's Visit to S. Korea Opposed
articles.content:
Trump's Visit to S. Korea Opposed
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and other organizations in Taejon of south Korea started an anti-war peace action in different parts of Taejon on Oct. 23, ahead of war maniac Trump's south Korea visit, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 They marched through streets, holding placards reading "War crisis on Korean peninsula, Oppose Trump's visit!" "U.S., withdraw hostile policy toward north and start negotiation for peace!" etc. and chanting anti-U.S. slogans.
					
					 They stressed the need to oppose lunatic Trump's south Korea visit that would bring a war to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They declared that they would launch rallies and demonstrations against his visit.

articles.title: Anti-U.S., Anti-War Action Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-U.S., Anti-War Action Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- An anti-U.S., anti-war action was reportedly launched in Pusan of south Korea on Oct. 21.
					 The Pusan People's Solidarity held a rally outside the U.S. Navy Command in protest against nuclear aircraft carrier Ronal Reagan's entrance.
					
					 The participants said that Pusan is no longer a safe place for the U.S. forces, expressing their will to wage the vigorous struggle against Trump's hostile policy toward the north and war frenzy.

articles.title: S. Korea: Candlelight Actions Launched
articles.content:
S. Korea: Candlelight Actions Launched
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Candlelight rallies were reportedly staged in different parts of Seoul on October 21 to demand the liquidation of evil practices and the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					 The People's Action Headquarters and other organizations called a press conference in Kwanghwamun plaza to declare the struggle for detention of traitor Lee Myung Bak. Then followed a candlelight rally.
					
					 Similar candlelight rallies were held by other organizations to protest against the deployment of THAAD and demand negotiations for peace against war on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: New Crimes of Traitors Opened to Public in S. Korea
articles.content:
New Crimes of Traitors Opened to Public in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- More crimes of traitors Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye have been reportedly opened to the public in south Korea.
					 On Oct. 18 a lawmaker from the Democratic Party disclosed a Chongwadae document saying that in an attempt to put down public opinion against the "government" and rig up election results traitor Lee instructed the puppet army to increase the number of agents of the cyber command in 2010.
					
					 Meanwhile, JTBC aired that when Park Geun Hye in office, Chongwadae gave instructions to the effect that "it is necessary to avoid responsibility and not to make an apology" as regards the death of peasant Paek Nam Gi.
					
					 In this regard, people of all social standings are pressing for the truth behind the crimes so as to keep the criminals from avoiding investigation for the liquidation of evils of conservative "regimes" and the punishment of those responsible.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held Abroad
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows were held in Russia, Thailand, Singapore, Algeria, Nigeria and Mexico between Sept. 28 and Oct. 9 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday.
					 The participants watched such Korean films as "The Sun of Songun Shedding Its Rays All over the World", "The People Sing of Their Leader", "Monument to Party Founding" and "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity".
					
					 The first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that it is thanks to the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, rare statesmen, that the DPRK has always emerged victorious despite the harsher moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces to stifle it.
					
					 He added that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un creditably carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders is demonstrating before the world the DPRK's sovereignty and prestige, standing up to the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower".

articles.title: Foreign Media Observe DPRK Holidays
articles.content:
Foreign Media Observe DPRK Holidays
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Newspapers and magazines of different countries on Oct. 6 and 9 gave write-ups to the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday.
					 They carried portraits of smiling leader Kim Jong Il and photos of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Indonesian paper International Daily lauded the party leadership feats of Kim Jong Il who developed the WPK into the leader's party, a mother party serving the people and the seasoned and experienced political general staff steering the Songun leadership.
					
					 The Nepalese online magazine Nepal Today noted that he developed the WPK into an ideologically pure entity and an integral organization ensuring the idea and leadership of the leader and into a party with solid mass foundation, stressing that his party-building feats would go down in history.
					
					 The Thai paper Xing San Daily praised him for having led the WPK to victory only for decades since he started his work at its Central Committee.
					
					 The Tanzanian paper Uhuru said that the DPRK, not big in its territory and population, is steadily advancing despite the daily escalating sanctions and pressure of the U.S. and other hostile forces, adding that the international community think that the secret of success lies in the political mode of the WPK. And it introduced the independent Songun politics and benevolent politics of the WPK.
					
					 The Congolese paper Le Patriot carried an article praising the WPK which is demonstrating its dignity and might as an invincible party under the absolute support and trust of the people.

articles.title: Efectuados presentacion y cursillo tecnico sobre la produccion de hongos
articles.content:
Efectuados presentacion y cursillo tecnico sobre la produccion de hongos
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar desde el dia 23 hasta el 25 en el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas la IV presentacion nacional de tecnicas y experiencias y el cursillo tecnico del cultivo de hongos bajo auspicios del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los cientificos, tecnicos, profesores, investigadores, funcionarios del taller y cultivadores de hongos de mas de 30 unidades, incluyendo la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, el Instituto Central de Setas del Ministerio de Agricultura, la Fabrica de Hongos de Ryugyong y la Fabrica de Hongos de Changsong.
					
					En la presentacion se dieron a conocer los exitos y experiencias logrados durante la campana para aplicar avanzados y rentables metodos de cultivo, ampliar las variedades de hongo y aumentar la produccion ahorrando el costo y la energia.
					
					Resultaron apreciadas las tesis que tienen gran significado teorico-practico en producir los hongos de manera cientifica, intensiva e industrial y como movimiento masivo.
					
					Durante el cursillo tecnico, se abordaron la tecnologia de cuidado de las variedades de hongos, la de cultivo de la seta negra no.1 y el proyecto de produccion a lo largo del ano en el invernadero semi-arqueado de la Fabrica de Hongos de Pyongyang.

articles.title: Terminada cosecha de arroz en la RPDC
articles.content:
Terminada cosecha de arroz en la RPDC
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- Concluyo en escala nacional la cosecha de arroz gracias a los esfuerzos de los funcionarios y trabajadores del sector agricola.
					A pesar de las desfavorables condiciones del tiempo, la faena se llevo a cabo hasta el dia 16 en las zonas rurales de las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur y Phyong-an del Norte.
					
					 Los agricultores de la ciudad de Phyongsong y los distritos de Jungsan, Taedong, Mundok, Ryongchon, Kwaksan, Yomju y Phihyon se concentran ahora en la recogida de las gavillas de arroz y la trilla.
					
					 Sus colegas de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur cosecharon cada dia mas de 5 mil hectareas.
					
					Entraron en la campana de trilladura los funcionarios y campesinos de las provincias de Hamgyong del Sur y Hamgyong del Norte y otras zonas septentrionales del pais.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun publica articulo por el Dia de la ONU
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun refuta la teoria de "autor principal" de los titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- En el informe de trabajo presentado recientemente ante la "reunion de inspeccion parlamentaria respecto al gobierno", el ministro de Unificacion surcoreano senalo que siendo "autor principal" del problema de la Peninsula Coreana, "impulsaria la solucion fundamental y pacifica del problema nuclear del Norte".
					Agrego que "crearia las condiciones del dialogo de desnuclearizacion al presentar con iniciativa el proyecto de asentamiento de la paz" y "llevaria al Norte a la mesa de negociaciones por la desnuclearizacion" ejerciendole junto con la sociedad internacional la "fuerte sancion y presion".
					
					En un articulo individual de este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de proceder ridiculo de los ignorantes de su situacion y continua:
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben conocer que no tienen calidad ni capacidad de hablar de "autor principal del problema de la Peninsula Coreana". 
					
					Esos tipejos, carentes del sano juicio y de la conciencia de independencia nacional, no pueden decir nada de la inaudita fiebre conflictiva de su amo gringo que niega totalmente la soberania y los derechos a la subsistencia y al desarrollo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Al contrario, realizan los ejercicios de guerra contra la parte connacional obedeciendo a ciegas a EE.UU. y tratan de eliminar el disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC, remedio todopoderoso para la defensa de seguridad y paz de la nacion.
					
					Ellos pretenden lograr el "dialogo por la desnuclearizacion" mediante la sancion y presion, pero esto es una ilusion nunca realizable.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun refuta la teoria de "autor principal" de los titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun publica articulo por el Dia de la ONU
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo hoy un articulo individual en ocasion del Dia de la ONU.
					La situacion internacional de hoy marcha en contrasentido al objetivo de fundacion de la ONU, adelanta el articulista y prosigue:
					
					A fin de cumplir su responsabilidad por la paz y seguridad internacionales, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU debe garantizar la imparcialidad en sus actividades. 
					
					Sin embargo, se ignoran abiertamente en ese aparato los principios de respeto a soberania, la igualdad y la no intervencion en asuntos internos de otros paises y se adoptan con chapuceria las injustas "resoluciones" que justifican y legalizan la politica de hegemonia mundial de EE.UU. 
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad es partidario de la logica y sofisma del imperio, segun el cual durante el debate en ese escenario, no importa lo que haga un pais sino quien es el que lo hace y lo justo y lo injusto debe ser definido segun el regimen que tenga el pais sometido a la consideracion. 
					
					Es imperioso reestructurar cuanto antes la ONU para eliminar el peligro de guerra que se cierne sobre el planeta y establecer un nuevo y justo orden internacional. 
					
					Es muy justo que la Asamblea General de la ONU tome la iniciativa de todas las actividades de esta organizacion internacional. Sobre todo, debe tener la autoridad de revisar finalmente las resoluciones del CS, que ejercen serias influencias a la paz y seguridad, tales como la sancion y el uso de fuerzas armadas. 
					
					Se presenta como asunto impostergable el cambio del CS, punto medular de la reforma de la ONU. Esta tarea debe ser cumplida en el principio de garantizar la imparcialidad y la objetividad en sus actividades y asegurar en su composicion la representatividad de los paises en vias de desarrollo.
					
					Como miembro digno de la ONU, la RPDC se esforzara con sinceridad en el futuro tambien por asegurar la paz y seguridad del mundo y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad con todos los paises que respeten su soberania.
